objectives.title: OUR OBJECTIVES
objectives.obj1_desc: Promote, Prevent, and Defend the rights of deaf women specifically and the population in the fields of health, education, and entrepreneurship.
objectives.obj2_desc: Actively promote gender equality, social inclusion and fight against all forms of discrimination within society.
objectives.obj3_desc: Fight against hunger by compensating for the food deficit through the promotion and dissemination of innovative and sustainable agricultural practices.
objectives.obj4_desc: Legally support deaf women, especially victims of violence, to ensure they have equitable access to justice.
objectives.obj5_desc: Campaign for the rights of vulnerable women and those living with disabilities, victims of sexual or gender-based violence.
